publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2737 Iain Gray: Special Grant Report No. 1 - Special Grant for Scotland Asylum Seeker Assistance: Report by the Scottish Ministers-That the Local Government Committee, in consideration of the Special Grant Report No. 1 - Special Grant for Scotland Asylum Seeker Assistance: Report by the Scottish Ministers, recommends that the report be approved. Supported by: Ms Margaret Curran*
